long_description: Lock your indoor training routine in place with the CycleOps Jet Fluid Pro Trainer Kit; you'll have everything you need for an effective workout that will keep you tuned up until the roads clear. PowerTuned technology provides smooth, realistic accelerations and inertia, and a real-world feel for a wide range of riders and riding types. Cool operating temperature delivers long-lasting performance and a stable progressive power curve. Provides smooth, quiet and realistic resistance. Ensures consistent resistance throughout the ride regardless of ride type. Frame accommodates quick installation and removal of bike via single-side mount; resistance unit locks in place for transport and storage. Frame levels easily for riding on all surfaces. CycleOps Jet Fluid Trainer Kit includes 2 climbing blocks, trainer mat and bike thong.
short_description: Lock your indoor training routine in place with the CycleOps Jet Fluid Pro Trainer Kit; you'll have everything you need for an effective workout that will keep you tuned up until the roads clear.
